meanings.definition: To press against something lightly with a piece of absorbent material.
meanings.sent1: She was dabbing the spilled juice with a paper towel.
meanings.sent2: The painter was dabbing the canvas with different colors.
meanings.sent3: He tried dabbing the tears from his eyes with a tissue, but they kept flowing.
meanings.sent4: The chef was dabbing the sauce on the dish like an artist painting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The nurse was dabbing the wound gently to clean it and prevent infection.

meanings.definition: A dance move in which a person drops their head into the bent crook of a slanted arm while raising the opposite arm in a parallel direction.
meanings.sent1: The dancer performed a perfect dabbing move during the routine.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone joined in the dabbing dance craze.
meanings.sent3: The dabbing move made the audience laugh and cheer at the talent show.
meanings.sent4: She looked like a graceful bird in flight while dabbing on the dance floor.
meanings.sent5: The dabbing move became the highlight of the performance, captivating the crowd.
